I stand with the victims, but we will not stand by if the issue is not addressed in this way.
Our team has been at work this week to determine the future of our group and for which members it must be active. We do not have a timeframe yet to provide further information. This is not an ongoing action or an ongoing investigation.
We will do so shortly.<|endoftext|>
